scripts.start2: concurrently --kill-others "node simulator.js" "set RHVtest=true&& set RHVrecord=false&& node server.js"
scripts.start3: node simulator.js&& set RHVtest=true&& set RHVrecord=false&& node server.js
scripts.start: set RHVtest=false&& set RHVrecord=false&& node server.js
scripts.test: node simulator.js&& set RHVtest=true&& set RHVrecord=false&& node server.js
scripts.record: set RHVtest=false&& set RHVrecord=true&& node server.js
